translations: n.苏（昔日法国之一种铜币）；无价值之物

sentences.sentence: And not a sou in the house!
sentences.translation: 并且家里一个苏也没有！

sentences.sentence: My daughter dangerously injured, not a sou!
sentences.translation: 小女受了重伤，很危险，一个苏也没有！

sentences.sentence: My poor children, you will not have a sou!
sentences.translation: 我可怜的孩子们，你们将一无所有！
